Class ProductBLL

java.lang.Object
BusinessLogic.ProductBLL
public class ProductBLL extends Object
Business Logic Layer for Product operations. Validates data and delegates database actions to ProductDAO.

    • insertProduct

      public void insertProduct(Product product)
      Inserts a new product after validating stock and price are non-negative.
      Parameters:
      product - the Product to insert.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if stock or price is negative.

    • updateProduct

      public void updateProduct(Product product)
      Updates an existing product in the database.
      Parameters:
      product - the Product with updated values.

      Deletes a product by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the product to delete.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the Product if found, otherwise null.

    • findAllProducts

      public List<Product> findAllProducts()
      Retrieves all products.
      Returns:
      a List of all Products.

    • isStockAvailable

      public boolean isStockAvailable(int productId, int quantity)
      Checks if the requested quantity of a product is available in stock.
      Parameters:
      productId - the product ID.
      quantity - the requested quantity.
      Returns:
      true if stock is sufficient, false otherwise.

    • decrementStock

      public void decrementStock(int productId, int quantity)
      Decreases the stock of a product by a given quantity.
      Parameters:
      productId - the product ID.
      quantity - the amount to decrement.

    • resetProductAutoIncrement

      public void resetProductAutoIncrement()
      Resets the auto-increment counter for the products table.
